content: this crochet pattern is for making a halloween heart ornament with a spider web and a spider yarn worsted weight #4 yarn crochet cotton thread size 10 finished size the heart is about 4 5 11 cm without hanging loop skill level intermediate language english the pattern uses crochet us terms free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/crochet-halloween-heart-ornament/ by purchasing a pdf file you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format
